title: account banned
body: seriously? im not calling anyone racial slurs, or bad names, this kid starts talking crap to everyone, everyones talking crap to everyone, and because i say stuff back i get banned? this is ridiculous man. like how is it fair? im not allowed to have a reaction or be competitive because im gonna get banned any time i talk in this game in a negative way. You expect us to be saints in a game that is so utterly frustrating that the only possible way to have fun is to actually interact with the other players, and you guys let streamers and everyone get away with so much yet im perma banned for being toxic and telling kids how to play the game better. its unreal.

replies.body: this isnt a first time offense, i got banned for 2 weeks the other day just for calling the other teams %%%s in my own teams chat log for camping in bush, do you know how ridiculous it is? and then to be permanently banned for yelling at some kid whos being super negative in general. I just dont understand this game.

when you received your 14 day suspension, it said VERY clearly on the punishment pop-up that your account would be perma banned for showing **ANY NEGATIVE BEHAVIOR**

did you do that? I dont care what the other guy did..did **YOU** show any negative behavior at all? if yes (and i think we all know it is) then this is justified

whatever man do you know how unfair it is to be called out by a player and you and your team are just sticking up for yourself so you get banned? like how ridiculous is that. its not justified for crap man.

why do you need to stick up for yourself?

if you know your account is on its last chance (which you did) and someone is flaming you, take a breathe, mute -> report -> move the hell on with your life.

do you think that the troll is going to magically see the error of his ways and agree with you? are you nuts?

flaming a toxic person back is only giving them the EXACT reaction they are looking for

internet 101: dont feed the trolls

Welcome to the beautiful SJW movement where free speech does not exist and defending yourself is just as bad as instigating someone who did nothing to you
